TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IPHostEntry extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供網際網路主機位址資訊的容器 (Container) 類別。

span.span: Provides a container class for Internet host address information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別能關聯陣列的別名和陣列比對 IP 位址的網域名稱系統 (DNS) 主機名稱。The class associates a Domain Name System (DNS) host name with an array of aliases and an array of matching IP addresses. 類別做為協助程式類別類別。The class is used as a helper class with the class. ## Examples 下列範例會查詢 DNS 資料庫中的主機 www.contoso.com 的詳細資訊，並傳回中的資訊執行個體。The following example queries the DNS database for information on the host www.contoso.com and returns the information in an instance. [!code-cpp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定與主機關聯的 IP 位址清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of IP addresses that are associated with a host.

value.span: 類型的陣列包含中所包含的主機名稱解析的 IP 位址屬性。

span.span: An array of type that contains IP addresses that resolve to the host names that are contained in the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來存取相關聯的 IP 位址。The following example uses the property to access the IP addresses that are associated with the . summary.span: 取得或設定主機的 DNS 名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the DNS name of the host.

value.span: 包含伺服器的主要主機名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the primary host name for the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含伺服器的主要主機名稱。The property contains the primary host name for a server. 當伺服器的 DNS 項目會定義其他的別名，將其用於屬性。If the DNS entry for the server defines additional aliases, they will be available in the property. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來擷取主要主機名稱。The following example uses the property to retrieve the primary host name. [!code-cpp[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/CPP/iphostentry_addresslist.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/CS/iphostentry_addresslist.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/VB/iphostentry_addresslist.vb#1)]
